body.name: COOFANDY Mens Cotton Linen Shirt Long Sleeve Button Down Shirt Band Collar Beach Yoga Shirts
features: Fabric type 100% cotton & Linen texture (This kind of fabric will shrink a little after normal washing. It is recommended to order one size larger! After washing and drying, it is best to shake the clothes flat and then dry them)

Premium Fabric --- Men linen beach shirt made of soft and airy cotton linen fabric. Feature with skin friendly, lightweight and breathable, which can provide you optimal comfort wearing experience and keeps you cool and relaxed all the time.

Beach Essential --- This men casual button down shirts adopts with collarless design, invisible button, practical left chest pocket, slit hem and loose fit style, which can make you look casual and handsome. Men linen stand collar shirt is a fashion style and a must-have item in everyone's wardrobe.

Easy to Match --- Men banded collar shirt could be easy to match with jeans, dress pants or shorts to create a formal or casual style. Compared with short-sleeve or 3/4 sleeve shirts, the long sleeve shirts design is more suitable for all seasons. Long sleeve summer shirtis great for sun protection and also convenient for rolled cuffs to further its easy-going feel.

Various Occasions --- This mens summer beach shirt is perfectly suitable for all seasons, is a great choice for beach, vacation, cruises, wedding, lounging, yoga, party, date or daily casual wear. Is the best gift to your father, or boyfriend and friends, for birthday, anniversaries or other special holidays.
Garment Care --- Washing Max Temperature 40°C. Machine and hand wash are both available for the men collarless shirts. Please refer to our size chart carefully before you order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely delighted with my Linen Shirt! From the moment I put it on, I could feel the superior quality and craftsmanship. The fabric is exceptionally soft and lightweight, making it an ideal choice for both warm and cool weather.What sets this shirt apart is its impeccable attention to detail. The stitching is precise, and the buttons are securely sewn, reflecting the careful thought put into its design. The long sleeves are not only stylish but also practical, offering protection from the sun.The fit of the Linen Shirt Long Sleeve is simply perfect. It drapes elegantly, flattering my body without feeling restrictive. I appreciate how it strikes a balance between a relaxed look and a polished appearance, making it suitable for various occasions. Whether I'm heading to a casual brunch or a more formal gathering, this shirt effortlessly adapts to the setting.One of the standout features of this shirt is the breathability of the linen fabric. I've worn it on hot summer days, and it kept me cool and comfortable. The natural moisture-wicking properties of linen make it a practical choice for staying dry even in humid conditions. The shirt's breathable nature prevents any discomfort from overheating.I must commend the color options available for this linen shirt. The variety of shades allows me to choose the one that complements my personal style best. The shirt's color hasn't faded after multiple washes, a testament to its durability.This linen shirt has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. Its exceptional comfort, versatile style, and thoughtful design make it a wardrobe essential. I have received numerous compliments every time I've worn it, and I find myself reaching for it regularly. If you're looking for a timeless, high-quality shirt that combines comfort, style, and sustainability, this shirt is an excellent choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit concerned about the sizing after checking the size chart. I normally take a large ("L") in casual shirts and that usually translates to a chest measurement around 44". The chart had the large at a 48.7" chest, but figuring the shirt was produced in Asia where sizing tends to run smaller I went with a large. The shirt arrived quickly and well packaged. When I initially tried it on it did hang a bit long (a previous reviewer said just below the waist, but mine was well below) and there was copious room in the chest. Feeling the fabric (100% Cotton) I put it in the washer (warm/cold cycle) and then in the dryer (medium/high). Other reviewers said it would shrink a bit and they were right. Now the chest is perfect and the length came up proportionately; good for use with shorts or long pants. It will not see the dryer again as that should be a one and done. Other reviewers described the fabric as "scratchy", and while definitely not as soft as other cotton shirts it's not uncomfortable. One of the features I really like is that the back of the shirt is about an inch longer than the front (2nd photo down on the site). This means if you have to bend over or squat down you won't experience the dreaded "plumber's crack". I plan to order a couple more colors as the price is very reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A beautiful shirt!
reviews.reviewText: The fabric is very and and the quality of this shirt is wonderful. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ample space for a generously-sized abdomen (HOLY MOLY)!
reviews.reviewText: As a man who cannot wear skinny boys' apparel, I decided to invest in a man's cotton linen shirt for the hot and humid Houston weather. Opting for a larger size to accommodate my arms, shoulders, and chest, I was pleased with the desired roominess in those areas. However, the shirt proved to be extremely big around the midsection, surpassing the expected extra room. While some additional space is usually appreciated, the excess fabric, in this case, was quite substantial, necessitating alterations for a more tailored appearance. Despite this, the material and design of the shirt meet satisfactory standards. Prospective buyers should exercise caution regarding the generous fit, particularly around the midsection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Felt like crepe paper, runs a lot smaller than size
reviews.reviewText: The material feels and looks like crepe paper. The sizing is way off, I got an XXL and it felt like a compression shirt, and this is before I washed it.I do not recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great fit. Excellent color and linen texture. Recommend!

reviews.reviewText: I bought one initially, then bought two more in different colors. It's an unusual style and I received a few compliments at the office. Good for business with jeans for business casual.
